fetch
jump to class

fetch( \xPDO $modx, \$id $id, string $type = disThread, boolean $integrated = false ) : \disThread/null

Fetch a thread, but check permissions first

Arguments
$modx
\xPDO
A reference to the modX instance
$id
\$id
The ID of the thread
$type
string
The type of thread: post/message
$integrated
boolean
Grab by the integrated_id instead of the id
Output
\disThread/null
The returned, grabbed thread; or false/null if not found/accessible
Details
visibility
public
final
false
static
true
static

getUrl( boolean $lastPost = true, array $params = array, boolean $regenerate = false ) : string

Get the proper URL for the thread, optionally with the post anchor and page

Arguments
$lastPost

If true, will get URL for last Post of thread
$params

$regenerate
